page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: There is a certain amount of overt and covert educational activity in the area. The following facilities exist for children :- Woodfall County{Infant}School Pupils: 187 Staff: 8 Neston C.E. Cont.{Infant}School Pupils: 96 Staff: 7 St. Winifrede's R.C.{Primary}School Pupils: 151 Staff: 6 Woodfall County{Junior}School Pupils: 217 Staff: 10 Neston County{Primary}School Pupils: 328 Staff: 13 Deeside Special School Pupils: 57 Staff: 8 Hinderton Road School for Children with Communication Difficulties Pupils: 14 Staff: 6 Mostyn House School Pupils: 129 Staff: 13
